attributes.additional_details:
All breeds are dangerous in the wrong hands, I truly believe that 1 fog attack is too many. People don't get the dogs for the right reason and purely based on looks alone. 

We need to stamp out backyard breeders and band owners. A dog is a product of its environment only. No dog is born aggressive
attributes.background: It's time to stop blaming the breed, we as owners are responsible for their actions. We need to stop bad ownership, educate people on what breed suits their life better, I feel a license will help with stipulations of being renewed 10 yearly and limiting the number of dogs allowed at one time.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611

Remove breed specific legislation. Consider alternative methods for dog control: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/638509

Bring back a Dog Licence: 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643650

Require anyone who breeds dogs to have a licence:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643033
